page.title: 10A WEEKEND IN JULY
page.content: ON SATURDAY MORNING MY FAMILY AND I WENT IN THE CAR TO ROMFORD TO DO SOME {SHOPPING.}ON SUNDAY AFTER NOON MY FAMILY AND I WENT{STAWBERRY PICKING}IN BILLERICAY.WHEN WE GOT HOME WE ALL HAD STAWBERRYS AND CREAM TO EAT. ON FRIDAY AFTER SCHOOL I PLAYED {TENNIS}WITH MY FRIEND. ON SATURDAY MY FRIEND AND I EXPLORED THE WOODS AT THE{OILIES}AND FOUND A HIDING PLACE.THERE WERE MANY MAGPIES IN THE WOOD.ON SUNDAY I WENT TO THE {FETE AT GABLE HALL SCHOOL.}I PLAYED AGAINST THE COMPUTER,THE GAME WAS CALLED HANGMAN. I SPENT MY WEEKEND WITH MY{PONY,} TREASURE.MY MUM SPENT HER WEEKEND WATCHING TENNIS AND CLEANING THE HOUSE.MY DAD SPENT HIS WEEKEND COLLECTING SKIPS AND TIPPING THEM AT EAST TILBURY.
